name: Cool Cucumber Cricket
description:
When you think of cricket what comes to mind? That's right this game needs more cards! In This game you'll attempt to lead your team to test victories by playing cards that make your players better or their players worse.

Lead your team Test Cricket Victory


Play your cards to tip the scales as you simulate a test match 6 overs at a time.


Build a Deck for your Bowlers and your Batters


Use cards to improve your players stats, make your opponents worse, change the weather or pitch conditions and many more things.


Recruit your team of Batsmen, All Rounders and Bowlers


Buy and replace players.



Gosh its hard to talk about games I just make them... Hope you enjoy.
